newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia tin down 11 cents to 14.25 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia tin down 11 cents to 14.25 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell 11 cents to close at 14.25 ringgit ($5.74) a kg after closely folowing an overnight fall on the London Metal Exchange (LME), traders said.
"There were no positive leads locally, and the market followed the LME," said a trader.
Offers outnumbered bids by 143 tonnes to 83, leading to a final turnover was 108 tonnes compared to 131 on Wednesday.
Buyers were Europeans and locals. The premium against the London market widened to $50 against $35 previously.
